item.description:
Hi Salsa Fans:

Join me for a fun night of dancing at Havana's.  I would like to meet up around 8 for everyone to get to know each other and hang out for a bit.  We can all meet at the "Taver at the Square " for drinks.  It's located around the corner from the venue.  I will be standing on the left side when you pass the entrance.

And remember, Salsa fans of all levels are welcome to join.

Looking forward to meeting you all,

-Angel

 

Venue: Greek American Political Club

Day: Friday

Age: 21+ Cover: $12

Time: 10:00pm-2am DJ Dance Party

Music: Salsa/Bachata/Cha Cha/Merengue

Meet-Up at the Tavern 8:00
Lessons: 9-10pm Beg/Int. Salsa Lessons w/ Salsa y Control

Website: Link

Address: 288 Green Street, Central Square, Cambridge map

Info:   Info Phone: (617)312-5550

Parking: Municipal garage ($6 max $1.50/hr), street and municipal lots Capacity: 350
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a fedora hat !!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Salsa Dancing at Havana's
